name: Race and Drift
description:
Strap yourself in and start your career as a top Formula 1 driver! Tap in time to make perfect turns, drift, and win against your opponents!

In Race & Drift you’ll be able to:
- Race on multiple tracks
- Make awesome drifts with one tap of a finger
- Upgrade your car for in-game money
- Unlock and drive new cars

With enough skill and practice you will be able to finish all of the races in the first place and become the best Formula 1 driver! Download the game now, Race & Drift!
